description.p: You summon a celestial life wolf (see NPC record) that acts on your turn. It spends its movement and actions to save your dying and unconscious allies, using one action to magically heal them to 1 HP.
Once no more allies are dying, the wolf vanishes.
If you drop to 0 HP while the life wolf is active, it will turn its attention to you, and vanish after saving you, even if others still require aid.
